label: Halley's Comet Project, 1985-1986
description: In July 1985, in anticipation of the return of Halley's Comet the following year, Dr. William R. Kubinec, chairman of the Department of Physics at the College of Charleston, published a request in "Sky and Telescope" for recollections of the 1910 appearance of the comet.  This collection consists of the worldwide responses he received.

metadata.label: Description
